name: Turret Tech
description:
"Turret Tech" is a confrontation among high-tech self-propelled machines in the struggle for excellence in resource-rich sectors. Control one of the combat vehicles and destroy the enemy forces in three different locations. Fight with several thoughtful bosses. Or take part in the battle for survival.
Five types of upgradable weapons.
A dozen types of opponents, each with their own tactics of struggle.
Countless randomly generated levels and sub-missions.
